TITLE: Creating a Next.js Application with TypeScript, Tailwind, and ESLint
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a new Next.js application with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint configurations. This is the first step in setting up a project that will use brijr/components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brijr/components/blob/main/app/(mdx)/start/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx create-next-app@latest my-app --typescript --tailwind --eslint
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Next.js Application with TypeScript and Tailwind
DESCRIPTION: Command to initialize a new Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint configurations. This is the first step in setting up a project to use the brijr/components library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brijr/components/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx create-next-app@latest my-app --typescript --tailwind --eslint
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing craft-ds to Set Up Component Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the craft-ds package which automatically sets up shadcn/ui. This is required to use the brijr/components library in your Next.js project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brijr/components/blob/main/app/(mdx)/start/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx craft-ds@latest init
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing craft-ds Design System
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the craft-ds package which includes shadcn/ui. This is required for setting up the design system foundation before using brijr/components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brijr/components/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx craft-ds@latest init
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rendering a Navigation Button with Next.js Link Component
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to implement a navigation button using Next.js Link component with a Button component from the UI library. The button is styled with the 'outline' variant and 'sm' size.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brijr/components/blob/main/app/(mdx)/start/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button";
import Link from "next/link";

<Link href="/">
  <Button variant="outline" size="sm">
    Back to components
  </Button>
</Link>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Web Crawler Access Rules in robots.txt
DESCRIPTION: Defines access rules for web crawlers, specifying allowed and disallowed paths, sitemap location, and includes a reference to the project's GitHub repository. The configuration allows access to all paths except the /play directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brijr/components/blob/main/app/robots.txt#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: robots.txt
CODE:
```
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /play

Sitemap: https://components.work/sitemap.xml

Github: https://github.com/brijr/components
```
